verbose_text: ~ 1 mg of N-(3-dimethylaminopro-pylN '-ethylcarbodiimide) hydrochloride (EDC, Sigma-Aldrich) and ~ 1 mg of Sulfo-NHS was firstly added to the solution of CuS solution (0.8 mg/ml, 200 mul) at pH 7.4 to activate the carboxyl group of CuS nanoparticles.
